mapper.select:
/* ====== kr.co.gocle.oklms.lu.activity.service.impl.ActivityMapper.listWeekActivityMakeStd ====== */
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT WEEK.YYYY, WEEK.TERM, WEEK.WEEK_CNT, MIN(SWT.TRANING_DATE) AS WEEK_ST_DATE , MAX(SWT.TRANING_DATE) AS WEEK_ED_DATE ,
TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(MAX(SWT.TRANING_DATE) ,'YYYY.MM.DD')+14,'YYYY.MM.DD') AS TRANING_DATE,
( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM LMS_ACTIVITY_NOTE AN ,COM_MEMBER CM WHERE AN.YYYY = WEEK.YYYY AND AN.TERM = WEEK.TERM AND AN.WEEK_CNT = WEEK.WEEK_CNT AND CM.MEM_SEQ =LES.MEM_SEQ AND AN.MEM_ID = CM.MEM_ID AND AN.TRANING_TYPE = 'OJT' AND AN.DELETE_YN='N' ) AS OJT_COUNT, ( SELECT MAX(STATE) FROM LMS_ACTIVITY_NOTE AN ,COM_MEMBER CM WHERE AN.YYYY = WEEK.YYYY AND AN.TERM = WEEK.TERM AND AN.WEEK_CNT = WEEK.WEEK_CNT AND CM.MEM_SEQ =LES.MEM_SEQ AND AN.MEM_ID = CM.MEM_ID AND AN.TRANING_TYPE = 'OJT' AND AN.DELETE_YN='N' ) AS OJT_COUNT_SUBMIT, ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM LMS_LESSON LL ,LMS_SUBJECT LS WHERE LL.YYYY=LS.YYYY AND LL.TERM =LS.TERM AND LL.SUBJECT_CODE =LS.SUBJECT_CODE AND LL.CLASS =LS.CLASS AND LS.SUBJECT_TRANING_TYPE = 'OJT' AND LL.YYYY=WEEK.YYYY AND LL.TERM =WEEK.TERM AND LL.MEM_SEQ = LES.MEM_SEQ AND LL.DELETE_YN='N' ) AS OJT_WORK_COUNT , ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM LMS_ACTIVITY_NOTE AN ,COM_MEMBER CM WHERE AN.YYYY = WEEK.YYYY AND AN.TERM = WEEK.TERM AND AN.WEEK_CNT = WEEK.WEEK_CNT AND CM.MEM_SEQ =LES.MEM_SEQ AND AN.MEM_ID = CM.MEM_ID AND AN.TRANING_TYPE = 'OFF' AND AN.DELETE_YN='N' ) AS OFF_COUNT, ( SELECT MAX(STATE) FROM LMS_ACTIVITY_NOTE AN ,COM_MEMBER CM WHERE AN.YYYY = WEEK.YYYY AND AN.TERM = WEEK.TERM AND AN.WEEK_CNT = WEEK.WEEK_CNT AND CM.MEM_SEQ =LES.MEM_SEQ AND AN.MEM_ID = CM.MEM_ID
AND AN.TRANING_TYPE = 'OFF' AND AN.DELETE_YN='N' ) AS OFF_COUNT_SUBMIT, ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM LMS_LESSON LL ,LMS_SUBJECT LS WHERE LL.YYYY=LS.YYYY AND LL.TERM =LS.TERM AND LL.SUBJECT_CODE =LS.SUBJECT_CODE AND LL.CLASS =LS.CLASS AND LS.SUBJECT_TRANING_TYPE = 'OFF' AND LL.YYYY=WEEK.YYYY AND LL.TERM =WEEK.TERM AND LL.MEM_SEQ =LES.MEM_SEQ AND LL.DELETE_YN='N' ) AS OFF_WORK_COUNT FROM LMS_SUBJ_WEEK WEEK INNER JOIN LMS_LESSON LES ON LES.MEM_SEQ = #{sessionMemSeq}
AND (LES.YYYY,LES.TERM) IN (SELECT H.* FROM ( SELECT HAK.YYYY,HAK.TERM FROM HAK_SCHEDULE HAK WHERE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN HAK.START_DATE AND HAK.END_DATE AND ROWNUM = 1 ) H )
AND LES.YYYY = WEEK.YYYY AND LES.TERM = WEEK.TERM AND LES.SUBJECT_CODE = WEEK.SUBJECT_CODE AND LES.LEC_STATUS='A' AND LES.DELETE_YN='N'
INNER JOIN LMS_SUBJ_WEEK_TIME SWT ON SWT.WEEK_ID = WEEK.WEEK_ID AND SWT.CLASS=WEEK.CLASS AND SWT.SUBJECT_CODE=WEEK.SUBJECT_CODE AND SWT.YYYY=WEEK.YYYY AND SWT.TERM=WEEK.TERM AND SWT.DELETE_YN='N' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY.MM.DD') > SWT.TRANING_DATE
WHERE WEEK.DELETE_YN ='N' GROUP BY WEEK.YYYY,WEEK.TERM, WEEK.WEEK_CNT ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(WEEK.WEEK_CNT) DESC ) A WHERE A.OJT_COUNT_SUBMIT IS NULL OR A.OFF_COUNT_SUBMIT IS NULL OR A.OJT_COUNT_SUBMIT ='W' OR A.OFF_COUNT_SUBMIT = 'W'

/* ====== kr.co.gocle.oklms.lu.activity.service.impl.ActivityMapper.listActivityNotMake ====== */
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.LESSON_ID,A.YYYY,A.TERM, A.SUBJECT_CODE, A.CLASS as CLASS_ID ,LS.SUBJECT_TRANING_TYPE, LS.SUBJECT_NAME,LS.SUBJECT_TYPE,LS.ONLINE_TYPE, COUNT(LSW.WEEK_CNT)-COUNT(LA.ACTIVITY_NOTE_ID) AS ACTIVITY_CNT , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(LSWT.TRANING_DATE ,'YYYY.MM.DD')+14,'YYYY.MM.DD') AS TRANING_DATE,
LSW.WEEK_CNT FROM (SELECT LESSON_ID,YYYY,TERM,SUBJECT_CODE,CLASS FROM LMS_LESSON LL WHERE LL.MEM_SEQ=#{sessionMemSeq} AND (LL.YYYY,LL.TERM) IN (SELECT H.* FROM ( SELECT HAK.YYYY,HAK.TERM FROM HAK_SCHEDULE HAK WHERE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN HAK.START_DATE AND HAK.END_DATE AND ROWNUM = 1 ) H ) ) A
INNER JOIN LMS_SUBJECT LS ON A.YYYY = LS.YYYY AND A.TERM=LS.TERM AND A.SUBJECT_CODE=LS.SUBJECT_CODE AND A.CLASS = LS.CLASS AND LS.DELETE_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN LMS_SUBJ_WEEK LSW ON A.YYYY = LSW.YYYY AND A.TERM=LSW.TERM AND A.SUBJECT_CODE=LSW.SUBJECT_CODE AND A.CLASS = LSW.CLASS AND LSW.DELETE_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN LMS_SUBJ_WEEK_TIME LSWT ON LSWT.WEEK_ID= LSW.WEEK_ID AND LSWT.YYYY = LS.YYYY AND LSWT.TERM=LS.TERM AND LSWT.SUBJECT_CODE=LS.SUBJECT_CODE AND LSWT.CLASS = LS.CLASS AND LSWT.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND LSWT.TRANING_DATE <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY.MM.DD')
LEFT OUTER JOIN LMS_ACTIVITY_NOTE LA ON A.YYYY = LA.YYYY AND A.TERM=LA.TERM AND A.SUBJECT_CODE=LA.SUBJECT_CODE AND A.CLASS = LA.CLASS AND LSW.WEEK_CNT = LA.WEEK_CNT AND LA.MEM_ID=#{sessionMemId} LEFT OUTER JOIN LMS_TRANING_NOTE_DETAIL TND ON TND.YYYY= A.YYYY AND TND.SUBJECT_CODE= A.SUBJECT_CODE AND TND.CLASS = A.CLASS AND TND.TERM = A.TERM AND TND.DELETE_YN='N' AND TND.MEM_ID=#{sessionMemId} AND TND.ADDYN = 'N' AND TND.TIME_ID = LSWT.TIME_ID GROUP BY A.LESSON_ID ,A.YYYY,A.TERM, A.SUBJECT_CODE, A.CLASS,LSWT.TRANING_DATE,LSW.WEEK_CNT, LS.SUBJECT_TRANING_TYPE,LS.SUBJECT_NAME, LS.SUBJECT_TYPE, LS.ONLINE_TYPE ) A WHERE A.ACTIVITY_CNT > 0

/* ====== kr.co.gocle.oklms.lu.activity.service.impl.ActivityMapper.activityList ====== */ SELECT LAN.ACTIVITY_NOTE_ID ,LAN.YYYY ,LAN.TERM ,LAN.SUBJECT_CODE ,LAN.CLASS AS CLASS_ID ,LAN.WEEK_CNT ,LAN.TRANING_TYPE ,LAN.STATE ,LAN.MEM_ID ,LAN.MEM_NM ,LAN.CONTENT ,LAN.REQ_CONTENT ,LAN.ATCH_FILE_ID ,LAN.PROJ_ATCH_FILE_ID ,LAN.FIELD_FEEDBACK ,LAN.PROFESSOR_FEEDBACK ,LAN.DELETE_YN ,LAN.INSERT_USER ,LAN.INSERT_DATE ,LAN.UPDATE_USER ,LAN.UPDATE_DATE ,LAN.STATUS ,LAN.STATUS_DATE ,LAN.STATUS_USER ,LAN.RETURN_COMMENT FROM LMS_ACTIVITY_NOTE LAN WHERE LAN.SUBJECT_CODE = #{subjectCode} AND LAN.DELETE_YN='N'

/* ====== kr.co.gocle.oklms.lu.activity.service.impl.ActivityMapper.getActivity ====== */ SELECT LAN.ACTIVITY_NOTE_ID ,LAN.YYYY ,LAN.TERM ,LAN.SUBJECT_CODE ,LAN.CLASS AS CLASS_ID ,LAN.WEEK_CNT ,LAN.TRANING_TYPE ,LAN.STATE ,LAN.MEM_ID ,LAN.MEM_NM ,LAN.CONTENT ,LAN.REQ_CONTENT ,LAN.ATCH_FILE_ID ,LAN.PROJ_ATCH_FILE_ID ,LAN.FIELD_FEEDBACK ,LAN.PROFESSOR_FEEDBACK ,LAN.DELETE_YN ,LAN.INSERT_USER ,LAN.INSERT_DATE ,LAN.UPDATE_USER ,LAN.UPDATE_DATE ,LAN.STATUS ,LAN.STATUS_DATE ,LAN.STATUS_USER ,LAN.RETURN_COMMENT FROM LMS_ACTIVITY_NOTE LAN WHERE LAN.WEEK_CNT = #{weekCnt} AND LAN.SUBJECT_CODE = #{subjectCode} AND LAN.YYYY = #{yyyy} AND LAN.TERM = #{term} AND LAN.CLASS = #{classId} AND LAN.MEM_ID = #{memId} AND LAN.DELETE_YN='N'

/* ====== kr.co.gocle.oklms.lu.activity.service.impl.ActivityMapper.getMyActivity ====== */ SELECT A.YYYY, A.TERM, A.SUBJECT_CODE, A.ADDYN, A.WEEK_ID, A.WEEK_CNT, A.DAY_OF_WEEK, A.TRANING_DATE, A.TRANING_ST, A.TRANING_ED, A.TIME_HOUR, A.TIME_MIN, A.TRANING_ST_HOUR, A.TRANING_ST_MIN, A.TIME_ID, A.REVIEW, A.CLASS_ID, A.PLAN_TIME, A.STUDY_TIME, A.ACHIEVEMENT, A.MEM_NM, A.MEM_ID, B.ACTIVITY_NOTE_ID, B.TRANING_TYPE , B.STATE , B.CONTENT , B.REQ_CONTENT , B.ATCH_FILE_ID , B.PROJ_ATCH_FILE_ID , B.FIELD_FEEDBACK , B.PROFESSOR_FEEDBACK , B.DELETE_YN , B.INSERT_USER , B.INSERT_DATE , B.UPDATE_USER , B.UPDATE_DATE , B.STATUS , B.STATUS_DATE , B.STATUS_USER , B.RETURN_COMMENT, ( SELECT ATCH_FILE_ID||'_'||FILE_SN||'_'||ORG_FILE_NAME FROM ATCH_FILE A WHERE A.ATCH_FILE_ID = B.ATCH_FILE_ID AND ROWNUM = 1 ) AS ATCH_FILE_STR FROM (SELECT WEEK.YYYY ,WEEK.TERM ,WEEK.SUBJECT_CODE ,'N' as ADDYN ,WEEK.WEEK_CNT ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(WEET.TRANING_DATE,'YYYY.MM.DD'), 'dy', 'NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=korean') AS DAY_OF_WEEK ,WEET.TRANING_DATE ,WEET.TRANING_ST_HOUR ||':'|| WEET.TRANING_ST_MIN as TRANING_ST ,WEET.TRANING_ED_HOUR ||':'|| WEET.TRANING_ED_MIN as TRANING_ED
,CASE WHEN SUBJ.SUBJECT_TRANING_TYPE = 'OJT' THEN WEET.LEAD_TIME ELSE ROUND((SUBJ.LCTRE_TIME+SUBJ.TEST_EXEC_TIME) * 15 / ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LMS_SUBJ_WEEK WEEK WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' AND WEEK.YYYY = SUBJ.YYYY AND WEEK.TERM = SUBJ.TERM AND WEEK.SUBJECT_CODE = SUBJ.SUBJECT_CODE AND WEEK.CLASS = SUBJ.CLASS )) END TIME_HOUR
,MOD(TRIM(WEET.TRANING_ED_MIN), TRIM(WEET.TRANING_ST_MIN) ) AS TIME_MIN ,WEET.TRANING_ST_HOUR ,WEET.TRANING_ST_MIN ,WEET.TRANING_ED_HOUR ,WEET.TRANING_ED_MIN ,WEET.WEEK_ID ,WEET.TIME_ID ,WEET.REVIEW ,WEET.CLASS ,WEET.CLASS AS CLASS_ID ,AA.PLAN_TIME ,AA.STUDY_TIME ,AA.ACHIEVEMENT ,CM.MEM_NAME AS MEM_NM ,CM.MEM_ID from lms_subj_week WEEK
INNER JOIN lms_subject SUBJ ON SUBJ.YYYY = WEEK.YYYY AND SUBJ.TERM = WEEK.TERM AND SUBJ.SUBJECT_CODE = WEEK.SUBJECT_CODE AND SUBJ.CLASS = WEEK.CLASS AND SUBJ.DELETE_YN = 'N'
LEFT JOIN lms_subj_week_time WEET ON WEEK.SUBJECT_CODE = WEET.SUBJECT_CODE AND WEET.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND WEEK.WEEK_ID = WEET.WEEK_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT TNM.STUDY_DATE, TNM.WEEK_CNT,TNM.TIME_ID,TND.ADDYN,TND.MEM_ID,TND.MEM_NM,TND.PLAN_TIME,TND.STUDY_TIME,TND.ACHIEVEMENT ,TNM.SUBJECT_CODE,TNM.YYYY,TNM.CLASS FROM LMS_TRANING_NOTE_MASTER TNM,LMS_TRANING_NOTE_DETAIL TND WHERE TNM.TRANINING_NOTE_MASTER_ID = TND.TRANINING_NOTE_MASTER_ID AND TNM.DELETE_YN='N' AND TND.DELETE_YN='N' AND TNM.ADDYN='N') AA ON
AA.MEM_ID=#{memId} AND AA.SUBJECT_CODE = WEEK.SUBJECT_CODE AND AA.WEEK_CNT = WEEK.WEEK_CNT AND AA.YYYY= WEEK.YYYY AND AA.CLASS = WEEK.CLASS
AND AA.TIME_ID = WEET.TIME_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COM_MEMBER CM ON CM.MEM_ID = #{memId} WHERE WEEK.SUBJECT_CODE = #{subjectCode} AND WEEK.WEEK_CNT =#{weekCnt} AND WEEK.DELETE_YN ='N' AND WEEK.YYYY= #{yyyy} AND WEEK.CLASS = #{classId} AND WEEK.TERM = #{term}
UNION ALL
SELECT WEEK.YYYY ,WEEK.TERM ,WEEK.SUBJECT_CODE ,'Y' as ADDYN ,WEEK.WEEK_CNT ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SWE.TRANING_DATE,'YYYY.MM.DD'), 'dy', 'NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=korean') AS DAY_OF_WEEK ,SWE.TRANING_DATE TRANING_DATE
,SWE.TRANING_ST_HOUR ||':'|| SWE.TRANING_ST_MIN as TRANING_ST ,SWE.TRANING_ED_HOUR ||':'|| SWE.TRANING_ED_MIN as TRANING_ED
,MOD(TRIM(SWE.TRANING_ED_HOUR) ,TRIM(SWE.TRANING_ST_HOUR)) AS TIME_HOUR ,NVL(MOD(NVL(TRIM(SWE.TRANING_ED_MIN),0), NVL(TRIM(SWE.TRANING_ST_MIN),0 )),0) AS TIME_MIN ,SWE.TRANING_ST_HOUR ,LPAD(SWE.TRANING_ST_MIN,2,'0') TRANING_ST_MIN ,SWE.TRANING_ED_HOUR ,LPAD(SWE.TRANING_ED_MIN,2,'0')TRANING_ED_MIN ,SWE.WEEK_ID WEEK_ID ,SWE.TIME_ID TIME_ID ,SWE.REVIEW REVIEW ,SWE.CLASS ,SWE.CLASS AS CLASS_ID ,AA.PLAN_TIME ,AA.STUDY_TIME ,AA.ACHIEVEMENT ,CM.MEM_NAME AS MEM_NM ,CM.MEM_ID from lms_subj_week WEEK INNER JOIN lms_subj_week_time_enrichment SWE ON SWE.WEEK_ID =WEEK.WEEK_ID AND SWE.DELETE_YN='N' LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT TNM.WEEK_CNT,TND.ADDYN,TND.MEM_ID,TND.MEM_NM,TND.PLAN_TIME,TND.STUDY_TIME,TND.ACHIEVEMENT ,TNM.SUBJECT_CODE,TNM.YYYY,TNM.CLASS FROM LMS_TRANING_NOTE_MASTER TNM,LMS_TRANING_NOTE_DETAIL TND WHERE TNM.TRANINING_NOTE_MASTER_ID = TND.TRANINING_NOTE_MASTER_ID AND TNM.DELETE_YN='N' AND TND.DELETE_YN='N' AND TNM.ADDYN='Y' ) AA ON AA.MEM_ID=#{memId} AND AA.SUBJECT_CODE = WEEK.SUBJECT_CODE AND AA.WEEK_CNT = WEEK.WEEK_CNT AND AA.YYYY= WEEK.YYYY AND AA.CLASS = WEEK.CLASS LEFT OUTER JOIN COM_MEMBER CM ON CM.MEM_ID = #{memId} WHERE WEEK.SUBJECT_CODE = #{subjectCode} AND WEEK.WEEK_CNT = #{weekCnt} AND WEEK.DELETE_YN ='N' AND WEEK.YYYY= #{yyyy} AND WEEK.CLASS = #{classId} AND WEEK.TERM = #{term} ) A , (SELECT * FROM LMS_ACTIVITY_NOTE WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' ) B WHERE A.YYYY = B.YYYY(+) AND A.TERM = B.TERM(+) AND A.SUBJECT_CODE = B.SUBJECT_CODE(+) AND A.CLASS = B.CLASS(+) AND A.WEEK_CNT = B.WEEK_CNT(+) AND A.TIME_ID = B.TIME_ID(+) AND A.MEM_ID = B.MEM_ID(+)
ORDER BY A.TIME_ID
mapper.update: /* ====== kr.co.gocle.oklms.lu.activity.service.impl.ActivityMapper.deleteActivity ====== */ UPDATE LMS_ACTIVITY_NOTE SET DELETE_YN = 'Y', UPDATE_USER = #{sessionMemSeq}, UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE ACTIVITY_NOTE_ID = #{activityNoteId}
mapper.select:
/* ====== kr.co.gocle.oklms.lu.activity.service.impl.ActivityMapper.listActivityCompany ====== */ SELECT * FROM ( SELECT INSM.SUBJECT_CODE , INSM.CLASS AS CLASS_ID , MAPP.COMPANY_ID, FN_GETCOMPAYNAME(MAPP.COMPANY_ID) AS COMPANY_NAME FROM LMS_SUBJ_INS_MAPPING INSM LEFT OUTER JOIN LMS_TRANING_PROCESS_MAPPING MAPP ON INSM.SUBJECT_CODE = MAPP.SUBJECT_CODE AND INSM.YYYY = MAPP.YYYY AND INSM.TERM = MAPP.TERM AND INSM.CLASS = MAPP.CLASS AND MAPP.DELETE_YN='N' WHERE INSM.SUBJECT_CODE = #{subjectCode} AND INSM.YYYY = #{yyyy} AND INSM.TERM = #{term} AND INSM.MEM_SEQ = #{sessionMemSeq} AND INSM.DELETE_YN='N' ORDER BY INSM.CLASS ) A
WHERE A.COMPANY_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchCompanyName } || '%'

/* ====== kr.co.gocle.oklms.lu.activity.service.impl.ActivityMapper.listActivityHrd ====== */ SELECT A.YYYY, A.TERM, A.WEEK_CNT,
MIN(A.WEEK_ST_DATE) AS WEEK_ST_DATE, MAX(A.WEEK_ED_DATE) AS WEEK_ED_DATE,
LISTAGG(A.WORK_NAME, ',') WITHIN GROUP( ORDER BY A.WORK_NAME) AS WORK_NAME,
SUM(A.OJT_COUNT) AS OJT_COUNT, SUM(A.OJT_WORK_COUNT) AS OJT_WORK_COUNT, SUM(A.OFF_COUNT) AS OFF_COUNT, SUM(A.OFF_WORK_COUNT) AS OFF_WORK_COUNT FROM ( SELECT WEEK.YYYY, WEEK.TERM,
WEEK.WEEK_CNT, MIN(SWT.TRANING_DATE) AS WEEK_ST_DATE , MAX(SWT.TRANING_DATE) AS WEEK_ED_DATE , ( SELECT LISTAGG(CM.MEM_SEQ, ',') WITHIN GROUP( ORDER BY CM.MEM_ID) FROM LMS_LESSON LL ,LMS_SUBJECT LS,COM_MEMBER CM WHERE LL.MEM_SEQ=CM.MEM_SEQ AND CM.DELETE_YN='N' AND CM.COMPANY_ID=TPM.COMPANY_ID AND LL.YYYY=LS.YYYY AND LL.TERM =LS.TERM AND LL.SUBJECT_CODE =LS.SUBJECT_CODE AND LL.CLASS =LS.CLASS AND LL.YYYY=WEEK.YYYY AND LL.TERM =WEEK.TERM AND LL.SUBJECT_CODE =WEEK.SUBJECT_CODE AND LL.CLASS =WEEK.CLASS AND LL.DELETE_YN='N' AND CM.MEM_ID NOT IN (SELECT A.MEM_ID FROM LMS_ACTIVITY_NOTE A ,COM_MEMBER B WHERE A.MEM_ID = B.MEM_ID AND B.DELETE_YN='N' AND B.COMPANY_ID =TPM.COMPANY_ID AND A.YYYY = WEEK.YYYY AND A.TERM = WEEK.TERM AND A.SUBJECT_CODE = WEEK.SUBJECT_CODE AND A.CLASS = WEEK.CLASS AND A.WEEK_CNT = WEEK.WEEK_CNT AND A.DELETE_YN='N' ) ) AS WORK_NAME, ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM LMS_ACTIVITY_NOTE AN ,COM_MEMBER CM WHERE AN.MEM_ID = CM.MEM_ID AND CM.DELETE_YN='N' AND CM.COMPANY_ID =TPM.COMPANY_ID AND AN.YYYY = WEEK.YYYY AND AN.TERM = WEEK.TERM AND AN.SUBJECT_CODE = WEEK.SUBJECT_CODE AND AN.CLASS = WEEK.CLASS AND AN.WEEK_CNT = WEEK.WEEK_CNT AND AN.TRANING_TYPE = 'OJT' AND AN.DELETE_YN='N' ) AS OJT_COUNT, ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM LMS_LESSON LL ,LMS_SUBJECT LS,COM_MEMBER CM WHERE LL.MEM_SEQ=CM.MEM_SEQ AND CM.DELETE_YN='N' AND CM.COMPANY_ID=TPM.COMPANY_ID AND LL.YYYY=LS.YYYY AND LL.TERM =LS.TERM AND LL.SUBJECT_CODE =LS.SUBJECT_CODE AND LL.CLASS =LS.CLASS AND LS.SUBJECT_TRANING_TYPE = 'OJT' AND LL.YYYY=WEEK.YYYY AND LL.TERM =WEEK.TERM AND LL.SUBJECT_CODE =WEEK.SUBJECT_CODE AND LL.CLASS =WEEK.CLASS AND LL.DELETE_YN='N' ) AS OJT_WORK_COUNT , ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM LMS_ACTIVITY_NOTE AN ,COM_MEMBER CM WHERE AN.MEM_ID = CM.MEM_ID AND CM.DELETE_YN='N' AND CM.COMPANY_ID =TPM.COMPANY_ID AND AN.YYYY = WEEK.YYYY AND AN.TERM = WEEK.TERM AND AN.SUBJECT_CODE = WEEK.SUBJECT_CODE AND AN.CLASS = WEEK.CLASS AND AN.WEEK_CNT = WEEK.WEEK_CNT AND AN.TRANING_TYPE = 'OFF' AND AN.DELETE_YN='N' ) AS OFF_COUNT, ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM LMS_LESSON LL ,LMS_SUBJECT LS,COM_MEMBER CM WHERE LL.MEM_SEQ=CM.MEM_SEQ AND CM.COMPANY_ID = TPM.COMPANY_ID AND CM.DELETE_YN='N' AND LL.YYYY=LS.YYYY AND LL.TERM =LS.TERM AND LL.SUBJECT_CODE =LS.SUBJECT_CODE AND LL.CLASS =LS.CLASS AND LS.SUBJECT_TRANING_TYPE = 'OFF' AND LL.YYYY=WEEK.YYYY AND LL.TERM =WEEK.TERM AND LL.SUBJECT_CODE =WEEK.SUBJECT_CODE AND LL.CLASS =WEEK.CLASS AND LL.DELETE_YN='N' ) AS OFF_WORK_COUNT FROM LMS_SUBJ_WEEK WEEK
INNER JOIN LMS_TRANING_PROCESS_MAPPING TPM ON TPM.YYYY=WEEK.YYYY AND TPM.TERM=WEEK.TERM AND TPM.SUBJECT_CODE=WEEK.SUBJECT_CODE AND TPM.CLASS =WEEK.CLASS AND TPM.DELETE_YN='N' AND TPM.COMPANY_ID = #{companyId} AND TPM.TRANING_PROCESS_ID= #{traningProcessId} AND TPM.YYYY=#{yyyy} AND TPM.TERM= #{term}
LEFT OUTER JOIN LMS_SUBJ_WEEK_TIME SWT ON SWT.WEEK_ID = WEEK.WEEK_ID AND WEEK.SUBJECT_CODE = SWT.SUBJECT_CODE AND SWT.YYYY = WEEK.YYYY AND SWT.TERM = WEEK.TERM AND SWT.CLASS = WEEK.CLASS AND SWT.DELETE_YN='N'
WHERE WEEK.DELETE_YN ='N' GROUP BY WEEK.YYYY,WEEK.TERM, WEEK.WEEK_CNT,WEEK.CLASS,WEEK.SUBJECT_CODE ,WEEK.WEEK_ID ) A GROUP BY A.YYYY,A.TERM, A.WEEK_CNT ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(A.WEEK_CNT) DESC

/* ====== kr.co.gocle.oklms.lu.activity.service.impl.ActivityMapper.selectActivityHrd ====== */ SELECT LS.SUBJECT_NAME ,LS.YYYY ,LS.TERM ,LS.SUBJECT_CODE ,LS.CLASS as CLASS_ID
,CM.MEM_NAME ,WEEK.WEEK_CNT ,SNU.NCS_UNIT_NAME
,LISTAGG(SNE.NCS_ELEM_NAME, ',') WITHIN GROUP( ORDER BY SNE.NCS_ELEM_NAME) AS NCS_ELEM_NAME , ( SELECT SUM(WEET.LEAD_TIME ) FROM LMS_SUBJ_WEEK_TIME WEET WHERE WEEK.SUBJECT_CODE = WEET.SUBJECT_CODE AND WEET.YYYY = WEEK.YYYY AND WEET.TERM = WEEK.TERM AND WEET.CLASS = WEEK.CLASS AND WEET.DELETE_YN = 'N' ) AS ALL_TIME_HOUR , ( SELECT SUM(WEET.LEAD_TIME ) FROM LMS_SUBJ_WEEK_TIME WEET WHERE WEEK.SUBJECT_CODE = WEET.SUBJECT_CODE AND WEEK.WEEK_ID = WEET.WEEK_ID AND WEET.YYYY = WEEK.YYYY AND WEET.TERM = WEEK.TERM AND WEET.CLASS = WEEK.CLASS AND WEET.DELETE_YN = 'N' ) AS WEEK_TIME_HOUR , ( SELECT SUM(TND.STUDY_TIME) AS STUDY_TIME FROM LMS_TRANING_NOTE_MASTER TNM,LMS_TRANING_NOTE_DETAIL TND WHERE TNM.TRANINING_NOTE_MASTER_ID = TND.TRANINING_NOTE_MASTER_ID AND TNM.DELETE_YN='N' AND TND.DELETE_YN='N' AND TNM.ADDYN='N' AND TNM.WEEK_CNT = WEEK.WEEK_CNT AND TNM.SUBJECT_CODE= LL.SUBJECT_CODE AND TND.MEM_ID = (SELECT A.MEM_ID FROM COM_MEMBER A WHERE A.MEM_SEQ=LL.MEM_SEQ) AND TNM.YYYY= LL.YYYY AND TNM.CLASS = LL.CLASS ) WEEK_WORK_TIME_HOUR , ( SELECT CEIL(AVG(TND.ACHIEVEMENT) ) AS STUDY_TIME FROM LMS_TRANING_NOTE_MASTER TNM,LMS_TRANING_NOTE_DETAIL TND WHERE TNM.TRANINING_NOTE_MASTER_ID = TND.TRANINING_NOTE_MASTER_ID AND TNM.DELETE_YN='N' AND TND.DELETE_YN='N' AND TNM.ADDYN='N' AND TNM.WEEK_CNT = WEEK.WEEK_CNT AND TNM.SUBJECT_CODE= LL.SUBJECT_CODE AND TND.MEM_ID = (SELECT A.MEM_ID FROM COM_MEMBER A WHERE A.MEM_SEQ=LL.MEM_SEQ) AND TNM.YYYY= LL.YYYY AND TNM.CLASS = LL.CLASS ) WEEK_WORK_ACHIEVEMENT , ( SELECT SUM(TND.STUDY_TIME) AS STUDY_TIME FROM LMS_TRANING_NOTE_MASTER TNM,LMS_TRANING_NOTE_DETAIL TND WHERE TNM.TRANINING_NOTE_MASTER_ID = TND.TRANINING_NOTE_MASTER_ID AND TNM.DELETE_YN='N' AND TND.DELETE_YN='N' AND TNM.ADDYN='Y' AND TNM.WEEK_CNT = WEEK.WEEK_CNT AND TNM.SUBJECT_CODE= LL.SUBJECT_CODE AND TND.MEM_ID = (SELECT A.MEM_ID FROM COM_MEMBER A WHERE A.MEM_SEQ=LL.MEM_SEQ) AND TNM.YYYY= LL.YYYY AND TNM.CLASS = LL.CLASS ) WEEK_ADD_TIME_HOUR , ( SELECT CEIL(AVG(TND.ACHIEVEMENT) ) AS STUDY_TIME FROM LMS_TRANING_NOTE_MASTER TNM,LMS_TRANING_NOTE_DETAIL TND WHERE TNM.TRANINING_NOTE_MASTER_ID = TND.TRANINING_NOTE_MASTER_ID AND TNM.DELETE_YN='N' AND TND.DELETE_YN='N' AND TNM.ADDYN='Y' AND TNM.WEEK_CNT = WEEK.WEEK_CNT AND TNM.SUBJECT_CODE= LL.SUBJECT_CODE AND TND.MEM_ID = (SELECT A.MEM_ID FROM COM_MEMBER A WHERE A.MEM_SEQ=LL.MEM_SEQ) AND TNM.YYYY= LL.YYYY AND TNM.CLASS = LL.CLASS ) WEEK_ADD_ACHIEVEMENT ,LL.LESSON_ID ,LL.MEM_SEQ ,LAN.ACTIVITY_NOTE_ID ,LAN.CONTENT ,LAN.REQ_CONTENT ,LAN.ATCH_FILE_ID ,LAN.STATE , ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM LMS_LESSON LLL INNER JOIN LMS_TRANING_PROCESS_MAPPING TPM1 ON TPM1.YYYY=LLL.YYYY AND TPM1.TERM=LLL.TERM AND TPM1.SUBJECT_CODE=LLL.SUBJECT_CODE AND TPM1.CLASS =LLL.CLASS AND TPM1.DELETE_YN='N' AND TPM1.COMPANY_ID = #{companyId} AND TPM1.TRANING_PROCESS_ID= #{traningProcessId} INNER JOIN LMS_SUBJECT LS1 ON LS1.DELETE_YN='N' AND LS1.YYYY=LLL.YYYY AND LS1.TERM=LLL.TERM AND LS1.SUBJECT_CODE=LLL.SUBJECT_CODE AND LS1.CLASS =LLL.CLASS AND LS1.SUBJECT_TRANING_TYPE=#{traningType} INNER JOIN LMS_SUBJ_WEEK WEEK1 ON WEEK1.DELETE_YN='N' AND LLL.YYYY=WEEK1.YYYY AND LLL.TERM=WEEK1.TERM AND LLL.SUBJECT_CODE=WEEK1.SUBJECT_CODE AND LLL.CLASS =WEEK1.CLASS
WHERE LLL.DELETE_YN='N' AND LLL.LEC_STATUS='A' AND LLL.YYYY=LL.YYYY AND LLL.TERM=LL.TERM AND LS1.SUBJECT_TRANING_TYPE=LS.SUBJECT_TRANING_TYPE AND TPM1.COMPANY_ID = TPM.COMPANY_ID AND TPM1.TRANING_PROCESS_ID= TPM.TRANING_PROCESS_ID AND WEEK1.WEEK_CNT= WEEK.WEEK_CNT AND LLL.MEM_SEQ=LL.MEM_SEQ ) AS TABLE_CNT FROM LMS_LESSON LL
INNER JOIN LMS_SUBJECT LS ON LS.DELETE_YN='N' AND LS.YYYY=LL.YYYY AND LS.TERM=LL.TERM AND LS.SUBJECT_CODE=LL.SUBJECT_CODE AND LS.CLASS =LL.CLASS AND LS.SUBJECT_TRANING_TYPE=#{traningType} INNER JOIN LMS_SUBJ_WEEK WEEK ON WEEK.DELETE_YN='N' AND LL.YYYY=WEEK.YYYY AND LL.TERM=WEEK.TERM AND LL.SUBJECT_CODE=WEEK.SUBJECT_CODE AND LL.CLASS =WEEK.CLASS
INNER JOIN COM_MEMBER CM ON CM.MEM_SEQ=LL.MEM_SEQ AND CM.DELETE_YN='N' AND CM.COMPANY_ID = #{companyId}
INNER JOIN LMS_TRANING_PROCESS_MAPPING TPM ON TPM.YYYY=LL.YYYY AND TPM.TERM=LL.TERM AND TPM.SUBJECT_CODE=LL.SUBJECT_CODE AND TPM.CLASS =LL.CLASS AND TPM.DELETE_YN='N' AND TPM.COMPANY_ID = #{companyId} AND TPM.TRANING_PROCESS_ID= #{traningProcessId} LEFT OUTER JOIN LMS_SUBJ_NCS_UNIT SNU ON SNU.DELETE_YN='N' AND SNU.YYYY=LL.YYYY AND SNU.TERM=LL.TERM AND SNU.SUBJECT_CODE=LL.SUBJECT_CODE AND SNU.CLASS =LL.CLASS AND SNU.WEEK_ID =WEEK.WEEK_ID
LEFT OUTER JOIN LMS_SUBJ_NCS_ELEM SNE ON SNE.DELETE_YN='N' AND SNE.YYYY=LL.YYYY AND SNE.TERM=LL.TERM AND SNE.SUBJECT_CODE=LL.SUBJECT_CODE AND SNE.CLASS =LL.CLASS AND SNE.NCS_UNIT_ID =SNU.NCS_UNIT_ID AND SNE.WEEK_ID =WEEK.WEEK_ID
LEFT OUTER JOIN LMS_ACTIVITY_NOTE LAN ON LAN.DELETE_YN='N' AND LAN.MEM_ID = (SELECT A.MEM_ID FROM COM_MEMBER A WHERE A.MEM_SEQ=LL.MEM_SEQ) AND LAN.YYYY= LL.YYYY AND LAN.TERM=LL.TERM AND LAN.WEEK_CNT = WEEK.WEEK_CNT AND LAN.SUBJECT_CODE=LS.SUBJECT_CODE
WHERE LL.DELETE_YN='N' AND LL.LEC_STATUS='A'
AND LL.MEM_SEQ= #{memSeq}
AND LL.YYYY=#{yyyy} AND LL.TERM=#{term} AND WEEK.WEEK_CNT=#{weekCnt} GROUP BY LS.SUBJECT_NAME ,LS.YYYY ,LS.TERM ,LS.SUBJECT_CODE ,LS.CLASS ,WEEK.SUBJECT_CODE ,WEEK.CLASS ,WEEK.WEEK_ID ,TPM.COMPANY_ID ,TPM.TRANING_PROCESS_ID
,CM.MEM_NAME ,WEEK.WEEK_CNT ,SNU.NCS_UNIT_NAME ,LL.LESSON_ID ,LL.MEM_SEQ ,LAN.ACTIVITY_NOTE_ID ,LAN.CONTENT ,LAN.REQ_CONTENT ,LAN.ATCH_FILE_ID ORDER BY CM.MEM_NAME,LL.MEM_SEQ

/* ====== kr.co.gocle.oklms.lu.activity.service.impl.ActivityMapper.listWeekActivityStd ====== */ SELECT WEEK.YYYY, WEEK.TERM, WEEK.WEEK_CNT, MIN(SWT.TRANING_DATE) AS WEEK_ST_DATE , MAX(SWT.TRANING_DATE) AS WEEK_ED_DATE , ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM LMS_ACTIVITY_NOTE AN ,COM_MEMBER CM WHERE AN.YYYY = WEEK.YYYY AND AN.TERM = WEEK.TERM AND AN.WEEK_CNT = WEEK.WEEK_CNT AND CM.MEM_SEQ =LES.MEM_SEQ AND AN.MEM_ID = CM.MEM_ID AND AN.TRANING_TYPE = 'OJT' AND AN.DELETE_YN='N' ) AS OJT_COUNT, ( SELECT MAX(STATE) FROM LMS_ACTIVITY_NOTE AN ,COM_MEMBER CM WHERE AN.YYYY = WEEK.YYYY AND AN.TERM = WEEK.TERM AND AN.WEEK_CNT = WEEK.WEEK_CNT AND CM.MEM_SEQ =LES.MEM_SEQ AND AN.MEM_ID = CM.MEM_ID AND AN.TRANING_TYPE = 'OJT' AND AN.DELETE_YN='N' ) AS OJT_COUNT_SUBMIT, ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM LMS_LESSON LL ,LMS_SUBJECT LS WHERE LL.YYYY=LS.YYYY AND LL.TERM =LS.TERM AND LL.SUBJECT_CODE =LS.SUBJECT_CODE AND LL.CLASS =LS.CLASS AND LS.SUBJECT_TRANING_TYPE = 'OJT' AND LL.YYYY=WEEK.YYYY AND LL.TERM =WEEK.TERM AND LL.MEM_SEQ = LES.MEM_SEQ AND LL.DELETE_YN='N' ) AS OJT_WORK_COUNT , ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM LMS_ACTIVITY_NOTE AN ,COM_MEMBER CM WHERE AN.YYYY = WEEK.YYYY AND AN.TERM = WEEK.TERM AND AN.WEEK_CNT = WEEK.WEEK_CNT AND CM.MEM_SEQ =LES.MEM_SEQ AND AN.MEM_ID = CM.MEM_ID AND AN.TRANING_TYPE = 'OFF' AND AN.DELETE_YN='N' ) AS OFF_COUNT, ( SELECT MAX(STATE) FROM LMS_ACTIVITY_NOTE AN ,COM_MEMBER CM WHERE AN.YYYY = WEEK.YYYY AND AN.TERM = WEEK.TERM AND AN.WEEK_CNT = WEEK.WEEK_CNT AND CM.MEM_SEQ =LES.MEM_SEQ AND AN.MEM_ID = CM.MEM_ID
AND AN.TRANING_TYPE = 'OFF' AND AN.DELETE_YN='N' ) AS OFF_COUNT_SUBMIT, ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM LMS_LESSON LL ,LMS_SUBJECT LS WHERE LL.YYYY=LS.YYYY AND LL.TERM =LS.TERM AND LL.SUBJECT_CODE =LS.SUBJECT_CODE AND LL.CLASS =LS.CLASS AND LS.SUBJECT_TRANING_TYPE = 'OFF' AND LL.YYYY=WEEK.YYYY AND LL.TERM =WEEK.TERM AND LL.MEM_SEQ =LES.MEM_SEQ AND LL.DELETE_YN='N' ) AS OFF_WORK_COUNT FROM LMS_SUBJ_WEEK WEEK INNER JOIN LMS_LESSON LES ON LES.YYYY = #{yyyy} AND LES.TERM = #{term} AND LES.MEM_SEQ = #{memSeq} AND LES.YYYY = WEEK.YYYY AND LES.TERM = WEEK.TERM AND LES.SUBJECT_CODE = WEEK.SUBJECT_CODE AND LES.LEC_STATUS='A' AND LES.DELETE_YN='N'
INNER JOIN LMS_SUBJ_WEEK_TIME SWT ON SWT.WEEK_ID = WEEK.WEEK_ID AND SWT.CLASS=WEEK.CLASS AND SWT.SUBJECT_CODE=WEEK.SUBJECT_CODE AND SWT.YYYY=WEEK.YYYY AND SWT.TERM=WEEK.TERM AND SWT.DELETE_YN='N'
WHERE WEEK.DELETE_YN ='N' GROUP BY WEEK.YYYY,WEEK.TERM, WEEK.WEEK_CNT ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(WEEK.WEEK_CNT) DESC

/* ====== kr.co.gocle.oklms.lu.activity.service.impl.ActivityMapper.listMonthActivityStd ====== */ SELECT LS.SUBJECT_NAME, LS.SUBJECT_TRANING_TYPE, WEEK.WEEK_CNT, WEET.TRANING_DATE, (SELECT FN_GETTRANING_PROCESS_NAME(A.TRANING_PROCESS_ID) AS TRANING_PROCESS_NAME FROM LMS_TRANING_PROCESS_MAPPING A WHERE A.YYYY = ACT.YYYY AND A.TERM = ACT.TERM AND A.SUBJECT_CODE = ACT.SUBJECT_CODE AND A.CLASS = ACT.CLASS AND A.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND ROWNUM = 1 ) AS TRANING_PROCESS_NAME, (SELECT LISTAGG(FN_GETUSERNAME(INS.MEM_SEQ), ',') WITHIN GROUP( ORDER BY FN_GETUSERNAME(INS.MEM_SEQ)) FROM LMS_SUBJ_INS_MAPPING INS WHERE INS.YYYY = ACT.YYYY AND INS.TERM = ACT.TERM AND INS.SUBJECT_CODE = ACT.SUBJECT_CODE AND INS.CLASS = ACT.CLASS AND DELETE_YN = 'N' ) AS INS_NAMES, (SELECT LISTAGG(FN_GETUSERNAME(TUT.MEM_SEQ), ',') WITHIN GROUP( ORDER BY FN_GETUSERNAME(TUT.MEM_SEQ)) FROM lms_subj_tut_mapping TUT WHERE TUT.YYYY = ACT.YYYY AND TUT.TERM = ACT.TERM AND TUT.SUBJECT_CODE = ACT.SUBJECT_CODE AND TUT.CLASS = ACT.CLASS AND TUT.DELETE_YN = 'N' ) AS TUT_NAMES , TO_CHAR(TRUNC(TO_DATE(#{searchMonth},'MM'),'MM'),'YYYY.MM.DD') AS MONTH_STR_DATE, TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(#{searchMonth},'MM')),'YYYY.MM.DD') AS MONTH_END_DATE, MEM.MEM_NAME AS STD_NAME, ACT.CONTENT FROM LMS_ACTIVITY_NOTE ACT INNER JOIN LMS_SUBJ_WEEK WEEK ON WEEK.SUBJECT_CODE = ACT.SUBJECT_CODE AND WEEK.YYYY = ACT.YYYY AND WEEK.TERM = ACT.TERM AND WEEK.CLASS = ACT.CLASS AND WEEK.DELETE_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN LMS_SUBJ_WEEK_TIME WEET ON WEET.SUBJECT_CODE = ACT.SUBJECT_CODE AND WEET.YYYY = ACT.YYYY AND WEET.TERM = ACT.TERM AND WEET.CLASS = ACT.CLASS AND WEET.WEEK_ID = WEEK.WEEK_ID AND WEET.TIME_ID = ACT.TIME_ID AND WEET.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(WEET.TRANING_DATE,'YYYY.MM.DD'),'MM') = #{searchMonth} INNER JOIN LMS_SUBJECT LS ON LS.YYYY = ACT.YYYY AND LS.TERM = ACT.TERM AND LS.SUBJECT_CODE = ACT.SUBJECT_CODE AND LS.CLASS = ACT.CLASS AND LS.DELETE_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN LMS_LESSON LES ON LES.YYYY = ACT.YYYY AND LES.TERM = ACT.TERM AND LES.SUBJECT_CODE = ACT.SUBJECT_CODE AND LES.CLASS = ACT.CLASS AND LES.DELETE_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN COM_MEMBER MEM ON MEM.MEM_SEQ = LES.MEM_SEQ AND MEM.MEM_ID = ACT.MEM_ID AND MEM.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND MEM.MEM_SEQ = #{sessionMemSeq} WHERE ACT.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND ACT.YYYY = #{yyyy} AND ACT.TERM = #{term} AND ACT.SUBJECT_CODE = #{subjectCode} AND ACT.CLASS = #{subjectClass} ORDER BY WEEK.WEEK_CNT, WEET.TRANING_DATE

/* ====== kr.co.gocle.oklms.lu.activity.service.impl.ActivityMapper.listActivityCcn ====== */ SELECT WEEK.WEEK_CNT, ACT.MEM_ID, ACT.MEM_NM, ACT.CONTENT, ACT.STATUS, ACT.RETURN_COMMENT, ACT.ATCH_FILE_ID, LS.YYYY, LS.TERM, LS.CLASS AS SUBJECT_CLASS, LS.SUBJECT_CODE, LS.SUBJECT_NAME, LS.SUBJECT_TRANING_TYPE FROM LMS_SUBJ_WEEK WEEK INNER JOIN LMS_ACTIVITY_NOTE ACT ON ACT.SUBJECT_CODE = WEEK.SUBJECT_CODE AND ACT.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND ACT.WEEK_CNT = WEEK.WEEK_CNT AND ACT.YYYY = WEEK.YYYY AND ACT.TERM = WEEK.TERM AND ACT.CLASS = WEEK.CLASS AND ACT.MEM_ID = #{memId} INNER JOIN LMS_SUBJECT LS ON LS.YYYY = WEEK.YYYY AND LS.TERM = WEEK.TERM AND LS.SUBJECT_CODE = WEEK.SUBJECT_CODE AND LS.CLASS = WEEK.CLASS AND LS.DELETE_YN = 'N' WHERE WEEK.DELETE_YN ='N' AND WEEK.YYYY = #{yyyy} AND WEEK.TERM = #{term} AND WEEK.SUBJECT_CODE = #{subjectCode} AND WEEK.CLASS = #{subjectClass} ORDER BY ACT.ACTIVITY_NOTE_ID DESC
